sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Verizon Communications ( VZ ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.4%.
Year to date, Verizon Communications has lost about 7.9% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Intel Corp ( INTC ), trading down 1.9%.
Intel Corp is showing a gain of 13.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are General Electric ( GE ), trading down 1.8%, and Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
